function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Main transmission route of the SARS-CoV-2 is via droplets carried via the air","Impact":"Increased risk of getting infected and maintaining an unhealthy environment","Mitigation":"Maintaining clean air is essential to decrease the risk of infection and to maintain a healthy environment","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Residents, building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Lockdown hindering the ability to perform physical activity","Impact":"Decreased physical activity, potential negative effects on general and mental health","Mitigation":"Providing indoor or on-site sports and recreation spaces for residents","Technologies":"Indoor sports facilities, on-site workout stations, access to fitness equipment","People":"Residents, individuals in lockdown","Owner":"Property managers, community associations, local governments"}]}
